name: ftlabs-email-signatures
description: A Chrome Extension that automagically adds links from RSS feeds to the end of emails sent in the Gmail web client

scripts.build-js: mkdir -p build/scripts; rm -f build/scripts/*; find ./src/scripts -maxdepth 1 -name '*.js' -execdir browserify {} -t [ babelify  --sourceMapRelative . --presets [es2015] ] -o ../../build/scripts/{} ';'
scripts.watch: npm run build && sh -c 'nodemon -e js --watch src/scripts/ --exec "npm run deploy" & wait'
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && cp -R ./src ./build && npm run build

author: FTLabs
